password_prompt: 密码长度必须在 8-30 位之间
username_prompt: 用户名必须是 3-30 个字符，可以包含字母、 数字、 下划线(_) 、 标签(#) 和空格

oauth_dup_email: 已经创建了此电子邮件的账户 (%s)，请登录到您的原始账户。
password_wrong_length: 密码长度必须在 8-30 位之间
invalid_username: 用户名无效。用户名长度必须为3-30个字符，可以包括字母、数字下划线(_)、井号(#)和空格。
dup_username: 此用户名已被其他用户使用。
dup_email: 本电子邮件已被其他用户使用

reset_password_email_sent: 邮件已发送，请根据其中的提示重设你的密码。
dup_username_or_email: 重复的用户名或电子邮件
no_password_set: You have not set a password yet.
recaptcha_site_key_desc: The site key for Google's reCAPTCHA service.
recaptcha_secret_key_desc: The secret key for Google's reCAPTCHA service.
site_url_desc: Public URL for your site, excluding the trailing slash(/)
restart_take_effect: Restart the server for this setting to take effect.
max_image_size_desc: The maximum size for uploaded images in bytes
max_guest_duration_desc: The duration in seconds that images uploaded by guests will be retained before automatic deletion. Enter '0' to disable this limit.
max_user_duration_desc: The duration in seconds that images uploaded by registered users will be retained before automatic deletion. Enter '0' to disable this limit.
allow_avif_encoding_desc: Encoding AVIF images may take a large amount of system resources (CPU & memory).
name: Name
s3_public_url_desc: The public accessable URL prefix for your s3 bucket.
restart_for_settings_to_apply: Restart the server for settings on this page to take effect.
no_storage_driver_found: No storage drivers available. Create a new one using the form below.
